configurations.name: spat_consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for streets internal SPAT messages

configurations.name: spat_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for streets internal SPAT kafka consumer.

configurations.name: vsi_consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for vehicle status and intent messages

configurations.name: vsi_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for vehicle status and intent kafka consumer.

configurations.name: exp_delta
configurations.description: Time(in milliseconds) without receiving status & intent updates after which a vehicle is removed from the vehicle list!

configurations.name: int_client_request_attempts
configurations.description: Number of attempts intersection client sending the HTTP request to get response with valid signal group ids.

configurations.name: initial_green_buffer
configurations.description: The time buffer in milliseconds to apply to the time when the phase will become green to avoid vehicles that are ahead of schedule entering before the phase is green.

configurations.name: final_green_buffer
configurations.description: Additional buffer in milliseconds for the end of a green phase that allows additional safety on top of the yellow clearance and red clearance.
configurations.name: tsc_config_consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for CARMA Streets internal traffic signal controller phase configuration message.

configurations.name: tsc_config_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for SO tsc_config_consumer.
